name: Square Scramble
description: Square Scramble is a 2 person fighting game where you play through different minigames trying to defeat the other player.  In Square Scuffle mode you are trying to knock the other player off the screen on a variety of different maps.  In the Boss Battle mode the longest survivor wins.  In the Platform Panic mode it's whoever can stay on the platforms for the longest.  It's fast paced and very exciting.
